attributes.action: Adopt a two-tier second referendum to clarify what type of exit the U.K. want
attributes.additional_details:
A 2nd vote/confirmatory mandate, or whatever the public/parliament want to label it, is the best way forward to fix the mess we find ourselves in politically.

A general election won’t happen, because as the ruling party the tories won’t allow it, & democratically where there are still questions over the conduct of the leave campaign, seeking the electorate’s approval with 3 real-time options + analysis, is our best option.

Ballot papers would have to answer Q2 or would be considered spoilt.
attributes.background:
Following the results of the 2019 Euro elections, it’s clear that the U.K. is still torn on how we exit the EU. A 2nd vote won’t be welcomed universally, but will deliver clarity.

A 2-tier option would be:

Q1 - Leave/Remain
Q2 - If Leave, then a. No Deal, b. Mays Deal, or c. Customs Union Fix

rejection.details:
